channel.title: debian on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in debian on Goofing Osamu

item.title: dgit workflow
item.description: For Debian maintainer, there can be 4 approaches for maintaining git repository with dgit. Let me get all key points of manpages. tutorials model tool history patch quilt maintainer dgit-maint-native(7) native git(1) upstream git (same) N/A upstream dgit-maint-merge(7) merge git merge(1) upstream git applied merged upstream involved dgit-maint-debrebase(7) rebasish git-debrebase(1) upstream git applied series pure downstream dgit-maint-gbp(7) gbp git-buildpackage(1) upstream tar unapplied series pure downstream Here, the maintainer column indicates relationship of the maintainer to the upstream development.
